doc:
A_Mighty_Heart http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Mighty_Heart 0 A Mighty Heart is a 2007 drama film directed by Michael Winterbottom; It is an adaptation of Mariane Pearl's memoir, A Mighty Heart. A Mighty Heart was met with positive reviews from critics and viewers alike. The film was screened out of competition at the 2007 Cannes Film Festival, before being released in North America on June 22, 2007. A Mighty Heart is a 2007 drama film directed by Michael Winterbottom; It is an adaptation of Mariane Pearl's memoir, A Mighty Heart. A Mighty Heart was met with positive reviews from critics and viewers alike. The film was screened out of competition at the 2007 Cannes Film Festival, before being released in North America on June 22, 2007.
